name: trilaterally
content:
trilaterally adverb
(GROUPS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves three groups or countries: Ministries in the three countries work trilaterally on transportation, energy, and food safety. Some work has been done trilaterally on automobile emissions standards.
More examplesFewer examplesProgress is most likely to be made bilaterally rather than trilaterally. Both countries will have to consider carefully how to deal bilaterally or trilaterally with the new tariffs.Sometimes details had to be negotiated trilaterally, with hospital operators as well as the patient and therapists.

trilaterally adverb
(SIDES)
mathematics
  specialized in a way that has three sides: trilaterally symmetrical forms trilaterally arranged legs See
trilateral
More examplesFewer examplesIt is trilaterally symmetrical in three-dimensional terms.
